document.full_text: stretches of the rising missouri river in south dakota were closed to boaters on wednesday to protect newly built levees, while the states of iowa, nebraska and missouri downstream rushed to prepare for the flood.
document.title: parts of missouri river closed to traffic as waters rise
lines_and_colors: stretches of the rising missouri river in south dakota were closed to boaters on wednesday to protect newly built levees, while the states of iowa, nebraska and missouri downstream rushed to prepare for the flood.
